solution_line_template: In total, the lollipops needed {ml_per_lollipop}ml of food colouring * {num_lollipops} lollipops = <<{ml_per_lollipop}*{num_lollipops}={total_ml_for_lollipops}>>{total_ml_for_lollipops}ml of food colouring.
This means that the hard candies needed {total_food_colouring_used}ml total food colouring - {total_ml_for_lollipops}ml food colouring for lollipops = {total_ml_for_hard_candies}ml of food colouring.

So each hard candy needed {total_ml_for_hard_candies}ml of food colouring / {num_hard_candies} hard candies = <<{total_ml_for_hard_candies}/{num_hard_candies}={ml_per_hard_candy}>>{ml_per_hard_candy} ml of food colouring.
